config.title: OneClick Markdown Converter
config.outputDirectoryDescription: Default output directory for converted documents (leave empty to use same directory as source)
config.maxRowsExcelDescription: Maximum number of rows to display per Excel sheet
config.preserveFormattingDescription: Preserve text formatting (bold, italic) when converting
config.showWelcomeMessageDescription: Show a welcome message when the extension is activated
config.tableOutputModeDescription: How to save multiple tables: separate files, combined file, or ask each time
config.tableCsvEncodingDescription: CSV file encoding (UTF-8 recommended for international use, GBK for Chinese Excel compatibility)
config.includeTableMetadataDescription: Include table metadata (title, source location) as comments in CSV files
